    public class HeaterRTAtomicSimulatorPlugin
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.RTAtomicSimulatorPlugin
    The class HeaterRTAtomicSimulatorPlugin implements the simulator plug-in to be used in the ThermostatedHeater component xhen performing SIL simulated executions (for testing).

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       OWNER_RPNAME != null && !OWNER_RPNAME.isEmpty()
 invariant       CURRENT_ROOM_TERMPERATURE != null && !CURRENT_ROOM_TERMPERATURE.isEmpty()

    Created on : 2022-10-27

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.time.Instant getCurrentInstant()
      compute the Instant corresponding to the current simulation time of the HeaterTemperatureModel, assuming that the start time and the start instant are known to interpret correctly the current simulation time as an Instant.
      java.lang.Object getModelStateValue(java.lang.String modelURI, java.lang.String name)
      The only model state value in the heater SIL simulators is the room temperature computed by the HeaterTemperatureModel, hence modelURI must be the URI of a HeaterTemperatureModel and name must equal CURRENT_ROOM_TERMPERATURE otherwise an assertion error will be triggered.

      • getModelStateValue

        public java.lang.Object getModelStateValue(java.lang.String modelURI,
                                           java.lang.String name)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The only model state value in the heater SIL simulators is the room temperature computed by the HeaterTemperatureModel, hence modelURI must be the URI of a HeaterTemperatureModel and name must equal CURRENT_ROOM_TERMPERATURE otherwise an assertion error will be triggered.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no more preconditions.
 post    true        // no more postconditions.
        Specified by:
        getModelStateValue in interface fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.ModelStateAccessI

      • getCurrentInstant

        public java.time.Instant getCurrentInstant()
        compute the Instant corresponding to the current simulation time of the HeaterTemperatureModel, assuming that the start time and the start instant are known to interpret correctly the current simulation time as an Instant.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition
 post    ret != null
        Returns:
        the instant corresponding to the current simulation time.

      • initialiseSimulationArchitecture

        public void initialiseSimulationArchitecture(java.lang.String simArchURI,
                                             double accFactor,
                                             boolean isUnitTesting)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        create and set the simulation architecture internal to this component.

        Contract

         pre     simArchURI != null && !simArchURIisEmpty()
 pre     accFactor > 0.0
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        simArchURI - URI of the simulation architecture to be created.
        accFactor - acceleration factor used in the real time simulation.
        isUnitTesting - when true, create the unit test simulation architecture.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
